mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Account_userprofile (NICK_NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, MOBILE, IMAGE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{nick_name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{mobile}, #{image}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT NICK_NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, MOBILE, IMAGE, EMAIL FROM Account_userprofile WHERE email = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE Account_userprofile SET NICK_NAME = #{nice_name}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, GENDER = #{gender}, ADDRESS = #{address}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, IMAGE = #{image} WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
